inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppMetrics
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name == 'PageVisitTime'
| where extract_json("$.PageUrl", tostring(Properties)) contains '/programmes/'
| summarize Count = count() by extract_json("$.PageName", tostring(Properties))
| project Count,  Course = replace_string(Column1, 'HMPPS Accredited Programmes -', '')
| render columnchart

content.Query:
AppMetrics
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name == 'PageVisitTime'
| where extract_json("$.PageUrl", tostring(Properties)) contains '/programmes/'
| summarize Count = count() by extract_json("$.PageName", tostring(Properties))
| project Count,  Course = replace_string(Column1, 'HMPPS Accredited Programmes -', '')
| where Course !contains "error"

partHeader.title: Number of course views
partHeader.subtitle: Number of times a course has been viewed

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppMetrics
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name == 'PageVisitTime'
| summarize SumMax = sum(Max), Count = count() by extract_json('$.PageName', tostring(Properties))
| extend Average = round((SumMax / Count) / 1000)
| project AverageTimeSeconds = Average, Page = replace_string(Column1, 'HMPPS Accredited Programmes -', '')
| order by AverageTimeSeconds desc

content.Query:
AppMetrics
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name == 'PageVisitTime'
| where Max < 600000//Remove any timings greater than 10 minutes
| summarize SumMax = sum(Max), Count = count() by extract_json('$.PageName', tostring(Properties))
| extend Average =  round((SumMax / Count) / 1000)
| project AverageTimeSeconds = Average, Page = replace_string(Column1, 'HMPPS Accredited Programmes -', '')
| order by AverageTimeSeconds desc

partHeader.title: Time spent on page overall
partHeader.subtitle: Average time spent on each page - ignoring any greater than 10 mins

AppMetrics

| where extract_json('$.PageUrl', tostring(Properties)) contains '/assess/'
| where Max < 600000//Remove any timings greater than 10 minutes
| summarize SumMax = sum(Max), Count = count() by extract_json('$.PageName', tostring(Properties))
| extend Average =  round((SumMax / Count) / 1000)
| where Column1 !contains  'Error'
| project AverageTimeSeconds = Average, Page = replace_string(Column1, 'HMPPS Accredited Programmes -', '')
| order by AverageTimeSeconds desc

partHeader.title: Time spent on Assess
partHeader.subtitle: Average time spent on each page

content.Query:
AppMetrics
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name == 'PageVisitTime'
| where extract_json('$.PageUrl', tostring(Properties)) contains "/programmes" or extract_json('$.PageUrl', tostring(Properties)) contains "/offerings"
| where Max < 600000//Remove any timings greater than 10 minutes
| summarize SumMax = sum(Max), Count = count() by extract_json('$.PageName', tostring(Properties))
| extend Average =  round((SumMax / Count) / 1000)
| where Column1 !contains  'Error'
| project AverageTimeSeconds = Average, Page = replace_string(Column1, 'HMPPS Accredited Programmes -', '')
| order by AverageTimeSeconds desc

| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name == 'PageVisitTime'
| where extract_json('$.PageUrl', tostring(Properties)) contains 'referrals/new'
| where Max < 600000//Remove any timings greater than 10 minutes

| extend Average =  round((SumMax / Count) / 1000)

| project AverageTimeSeconds = Average, Page = replace_string(Column1, 'HMPPS Accredited Programmes -', '')
| order by AverageTimeSeconds desc

partHeader.title: Time spent on creating Referrals
partHeader.subtitle: Average time spent on each page within the referral journey

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name !in ('GET /ping', 'GET /health', 'HEAD /', 'GET /metrics')
| where Url has '/programmes/'
| extend caseload = tostring(parse_json(Properties).activeCaseLoadId)
| summarize count() by caseload, Name
| extend courseName = replace_string(Name, 'GET /programmes/','')
| summarize courseCount = count() by caseload, courseName 
| render columnchart

content.Query:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Url has '/programmes/'
| extend caseload = tostring(parse_json(Properties).activeCaseLoadDescription)
| extend username = tostring(parse_json(Properties).username)
| where username != 'ACP_TEST'
| where caseload != ''
| extend courseCode = replace_string(Name, 'GET /find/programmes/','')
| extend courseCode = replace_string(courseCode, 'HEAD /find/programmes/','')
| join kind=leftouter (
    AppMetrics
    | where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
    | where Name == 'PageVisitTime'
    | where OperationName contains '/find/programmes/'
    | extend courseId = replace_string(OperationName, '/find/programmes/', '')
    | extend courseName = split(replace_string(tostring(parse_json(Properties).PageName), 'HMPPS Accredited Programmes - ', ''), ':' )[0]
    | extend courseName = split(courseName, '(')[0]
    | extend courseName = split(courseName, ',')[0]
    | where courseName !in ('List of accredited programmes', 'Error', 'My referrals','Find an Accredited Programme')
    | project tostring(courseId), tostring(courseName)
    | distinct *
) on $left.courseCode == $right.courseId
| where courseName != ''
| summarize courseCount = count() by caseload, courseName = tostring(courseName)
| render columnchart
content.PartTitle: Accredited Programme views by Prison Site

partHeader.title: Count of course views by users active caseload

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
| extend userName = tostring(parse_json(Properties).username)
| where userName != 'ACP_TEST'
| extend Action = iff(Name endswith "submit", "Submitted", "Created")
| summarize Count=count() by Action, Date=bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| render columnchart with (title="Number 'referral created' and 'referral submitted' by Day")

inputs.name: PartTitle
inputs.value: Number 'referral created' and 'referral submitted' by Day

inputs.value: Number 'referral created' and 'referral submitted' by Day

content.Query:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
| extend userName = tostring(parse_json(Properties).username)
| where userName != 'ACP_TEST'
| extend Action = iff(Name endswith "submit", "Submitted", "Created")
| summarize Count=count() by Action
| render columnchart with (title="Total 'referral created' and 'referral submitted'")

partHeader.title: Number of created an submitted referrals

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| extend Day = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| extend userName = tostring(parse_json(Properties).username)
| where isnotempty(userName)
| where Success == True
| summarize UniqueUsers = dcount(userName) by Day
| render columnchart

content.Query:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| extend Day = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| extend userName = tostring(parse_json(Properties).username)
| where isnotempty(userName)
| where Success == True
| summarize Number_Unique_Users = dcount(userName) by Day
| render columnchart

partHeader.title: Unique users
partHeader.subtitle: Number of unique users per day

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// Count of failed and successful requests over time
requests
| extend success=tobool(success)
| where timestamp > datetime("2024-04-19T08:59:00.000Z") and timestamp < datetime("2024-04-19T09:59:00.000Z")
| where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where client_Type == "PC"
| summarize
    succeeded=sumif(itemCount, success == true),
    failed=sumif(itemCount, success == false)
    by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| render timechart

content.Query:
requests
| where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-prisoner-search'
| order by timestamp desc
| extend Day = startofday(timestamp)
| summarize 
    succeeded=sumif(itemCount, success == true),
    failed=sumif(itemCount, success == false)
    by Day
| render timechart
